title: how to keep mana up as a fiddle support?
body: I like using fiddles as an aggresive support but it can only last so long since he will run out of mana in the early lane phase. any good rune builds or starting items to help with mana issues?

replies.body:
Manaflow Band in the Sorcery tree. Ancient Coin instead of the poke support item. Get the Corrupting Potion (500g) on first back if you want to have a lot more mana. Build mana item ASAP. 
Other than that, mana is a way of holding supports in check. Support (or mid for that matter) Fiddlesticks is pretty obnoxious to lane against. It doesn't really take any skill or risk to spam Darkwind on the minion wave, and it deals a lot of damage at low levels as well as the silence. If mana was never an issue the enemy adc would just be automatically forced out of lane after a certain time. It keeps some balance - if you want to use all your mana aggressively in the hope of getting kills, but the other laners can sustain through it, youre going to be vulnerable to ganks or all ins.

**Sorcery :**
_Summon Aery
Manaflow Band
Celerity
Scorch/Waterwalking (depending on playstyle)_
